title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1044.14 - Enforcement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1044.14 - Enforcement

State Regulations
(a) Any person
violating any of these rules may receive a summons and/or may be subject to
ejectment from a facility or bus. (b) Any police officer or member of MTABC or
the authority enforcement team is empowered to issue an appearance ticket
and/or order ejectment from a facility or bus for violation of any of these
rules. (c) Violation of these rules
shall constitute an offense punishable by a fine not exceeding $50 or
imprisonment for not more than 30 days or both. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1044.14

Adopted

New

York State Register April 13, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 15, eff. 4/13/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
